name: Fire Breakout
description:
Fire Breakout is a game that simulates the real scene of a residential fire, you will use your daily knowledge of fire protection and use the various tools provided in the game to deal with various fire dangers. In this realistic fire scene game, you will freely and flexibly deal with fire accidents, whether to quickly escape, choose to extinguish the fire to save property, residents, or call the police to wait for rescue, or clear the safety hazards in time, completely up to yourself, different choices will also affect the development of the fire, and the fires you face in the game will be more diverse and challenging.

Experience endless possibilities for fire handling gameplay
Players will know the specific location and fire type they are currently in at the beginning of the game, the game gets rid of the step-by-step operation process, players only need to flexibly deal with fire accidents according to the scoring items of the current level, whether to choose to extinguish the fire immediately, or hide in a safe area after the alarm, with the help of various tools to protect themselves, completely up to themselves. According to the current fire and fire type, you can choose the right fire extinguishing equipment to complete the fire, or when using the mobile phone alarm in the house, provide your specific location so that the firefighters can accurately find you, after the alarm, you can decide whether to run away immediately according to the fire and the current smoke situation in the house, or hide in the room waiting for rescue, pay attention to waiting for rescue can use clothing to block the door crack to prevent smoke from entering, but this is not absolutely safe, As soon as the door burns out, a lot of smoke will pour in, and it is important to choose a suitable room while waiting for rescue. In addition, for different fire scenes, you need to make accurate judgments, improper handling will increase the fire, and even cause explosion, deflagration, etc. Smoke injuries in fire accidents are often the most deadly, you can lower your posture, squat or crawl, reduce smoke damage, be careful not to get too close to the flame, direct close contact with the flame will be seriously burned, and even ignite yourself, causing major injury.

Multiple mission types, more props to use, so that your survival skills are more comprehensive

Game tasks around fire extinguishing, rescue, escape, remove safety hazards, the use and setting of fire extinguishing equipment refer to real life actual parameters, you can actually see the pressure of the current fire extinguisher through the pressure dial, which is also a factor to consider when extinguishing fire, of course, always remember that when encountering a fire can not be determined or can not escape, timely call for help is also very important. Different tools combined with various fire scenes, providing you with more possibilities for gameplay, in the game of the completion of the task and score, you can get different honors, hurry up to join the game, with the fire knowledge mastered, create your own honor!
